description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共吉林省委宣传部部长，吉林省文学艺术界联合会主席，吉林省政协副主席。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee, Chairman of the Jilin Federation of Literary and Art Circles, and Vice Chairman of the Jilin Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会负责宣传思想工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for propaganda and ideological work.

nodes.id: 吉林省文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 吉林省文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 由吉林省文学艺术界联合会和各艺术家协会组成的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization composed of the Jilin Provincial Federation of Literary and Art Circles and various artists' associations.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议吉林省委员会，是中国人民政治协商会议在吉林省的地方组织。
description.en: The Jilin Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference is the local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡厚钧是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Hu Houjun is a political figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡厚钧曾任中共吉林省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Hu Houjun formerly served as the Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 吉林省文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 胡厚钧曾任吉林省文学艺术界联合会主席。
description.en: Hu Houjun formerly served as the Chairman of the Jilin Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 胡厚钧曾任吉林省政协副主席。
description.en: Hu Houjun formerly served as the Vice Chairman of the Jilin Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，胡厚钧是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia category, Hu Houjun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共吉林省委宣传部是中共吉林省委的下属部门。
description.en: The Propaganda Department of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee is a subordinate department of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee.
